column2: Latest;Phnom Penh: EdC were forced to shut off an electrical sub-station (GS1-F16) after a fire at New World
column4: causing blackouts across the area.------ EdC announced on April 24
column7: the station would be cloed down until the fire was controlled and damage assessed.  Areas around Mong Rithy Street Village
column10: Phnom Penh were affected by the blackout.------.
